output: html_document

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic) 
library(ggformula)
urchin <- read_csv("data_collection.csv") 

urchin <- urchin |> 
  mutate(high_tide = tide_level >= 1)
```

# Summary Statistics

```{r summary_stats}
df_stats(count ~ location, data = urchin)
df_stats(count ~ high_tide, data = urchin)
```

```{r graphics}
gf_point(count ~ location, data = urchin, color = ~high_tide)
```
